name: E-sekai
description:
2D project developed by 1st year students of the Games Development course (2020/2021).

Developed by:

  • Hugo Bonito
  • João Ribeiro
  • Vasco Ferreira

Controls:

  • A or left arrow - Walk left
  • D or right arrow - Walk right
  • W or up arrow - Jump
  • Q or space - Shoot

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
